fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Portia is consortium partner in GENERA project, funded under Horizon 2020  
Portia is consortium partner in H2020n ACE project 
Portia is consortium partner in DG RTD project on statistical gender indicators in STEM
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Portia Ltd designs and implements effective, evidence-based strategies for advancing quality of research and innovation by addressing common gender problems in institutional practices, in science knowledge making, in human capital development, and in implementation of legislation. Our work covers gender equality issues in STEM and gender dimension in research and innovation content, process and impact across wide variety of science (STEM) fields and endeavours.
relevant_communication: Portia co-convenes the Gender Summit® www.gender-summit.com in the EU and in different regions throughout the world, including North America, Africa, Asia Pacific, and Latin America
legal_status: Not For Profit Company limited by guarantee
